mutants.original_line: words = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', text.lower())  # Extract words and convert to lowercase
mutants.code:
from typing import List
import re
from collections import Counter

def top_n_words(text: str, n: int) -> List[str]:
    words = re.findall('', text.lower())
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    top_n = [word for (word, _) in word_counts.most_common(n)]
    return sorted(top_n)
